meanings.definition: The state of having great wealth or luxury.
meanings.sent1: Her opulences were evident in the grand mansion she lived in.
meanings.sent2: The opulences of the royal family were admired by all.
meanings.sent3: Despite his opulences, he preferred simple pleasures like reading books.
meanings.sent4: The opulences of nature's beauty surrounded the peaceful lake.
meanings.sent5: The opulences of the banquet left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The opulences of fresh fruits at the market delighted the shoppers.
meanings.sent2: In spring, the opulences of colorful flowers filled the gardens.
meanings.sent3: The opulences of snacks in the pantry made the kids excited.
meanings.sent4: The opulences of knowledge in the library amazed the students.
meanings.sent5: The opulences of stars in the night sky sparkled brightly.
